name: Self-Care Clash
description:
Run around Caremart, looking for the items you need to stay safe and sane during the lockdown while avoiding the other players for the sake of both of your health bars. The person with the most stuff at the end of two minutes is of course, the arbitrary winner!

... If this game worked right. Instead it's a free for all hammer match and whoever's left standing or has the most kills wins. Picking up self-care items does replenish your health though (hopefully).

Made for the 6th 72hr Extra Credits Game Jam with attempts made for the Extra Multiplayer, Extra Distanced (if the mechanic worked right) and Extra Historical (if I could import assets) categories
